value.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Run Ironic baremetal provisioning
Wants=network-online.target
After=network-online.target
ConditionPathExistsGlob=|/home/core/images/redhat-coreos-maipo-*.qcow2

[Service]
EnvironmentFile=/etc/ironicservice
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/podman pull ${IRONIC_IMAGE}
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/podman rm ironic
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name ironic --net host --privileged -v /home/core/dnsmasq.conf:/etc/dnsmasq.conf -v /home/core/dualboot.ipxe:/var/www/html/dualboot.ipxe -v /home/core/inspector.ipxe:/var/www/html/inspector.ipxe -v /home/core/images:/var/www/html/images ${IRONIC_IMAGE}
ExecReload=-/usr/bin/podman stop ironic
ExecReload=-/usr/bin/podman rm ironic
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=30
value.name: ironic.service
